title: Rethinking Consciousness – The Ethical Debate Surrounding AI and Animals
description: In the current discourse surrounding Artificial Intelligence (AI), a significant ethical dilemma emerges as comparisons between AI and animal intelligence gain traction. The struggle to define consciousness, especially when viewed through the lens of human experience, raises questions about the ethical implications of such comparisons.  The language used in discussing the complexities of AI and […]

title: Astar Network gains 26% in 7 days on heels of Polkadot, Polygon partnership
description: Astar Network’s token has witnessed a 26% price increase in the past week. Leveraging the cross-virtual machine feature on Polygon and Polkadot, Astar delivers personalized blockchain solutions.
